Package de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.icge.ui

Interface Toolbar

  • public interface Toolbar
    The toolbar used by a GameWindow to handle the toolbar.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Tim Neumann, Tobias WÃ¤ltken

      Nested Classes

      static class  Toolbar.ClockButtonState
      The clock button state represents the states of the clock buttons in the ui

      The control button state represents the status of the control buttons in the ui

      • addEntity

        void addEntity​(String displayName,
               String textureID)
        Append the list of entities with the given entry
        Parameters:
        displayName - the name which is displayed for the user
        textureID - the texture which is rendert infront of the display name
        See Also:
        DropdownSelector

      • getSpeedSliderPosition

        int getSpeedSliderPosition()
        Get the current position of the speed slider.
        Returns:
        The position from 0 to 10 (both inclusive)

      • setSpeedSliderPosition

        void setSpeedSliderPosition​(int position)
        Set the position of the speed slider.
        Parameters:
        position - The new position; can be from 0 to 10 (both inclusive)

      • getCurrentlySelectedEntity

        String getCurrentlySelectedEntity()
        Get the entity currently selected in the entity selection dropdown.
        Returns:

                               String textureId)
        Add a entity to the entity selector drop down.

        name - The name of the new entity.
        textureId - The texture handle of the new entity.
